title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 6.8? Click Here!
body:
> #UPDATE 4/20 Mac Sound/FPS issues:

> From our testing, Macs users experiencing distorted sound/low FPS should've be fixed in Patch 6.8. It's been difficult to reliably reproduce the low FPS issue in our internal labs, but our internal machines no longer show the issue.

> We know some of you are still experiencing it, and because of the challenge in reproducing this, we'd like to get some further helpful information in order for us to track it down.  Please go to this [thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/IB3ucbih-mac-sound-not-resolved-patch-68) and provide this info:
* System specs (Operating System, CPU, GPU, RAM)
* Have you tried disabling in-game sounds? (Y/N)
* How often do you experience degraded FPS?

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey everyone,

In Patch 6.8 things are about to get truly...

http://i.imgur.com/4woAdqI.png

You know what shouldn't be outrageous? Patching your client. If you are having issues, read the steps below. If they don't help out, drop a comment and we'll have your back!

----------------------------------------------

> #***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

> #***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

Bugsplat at 33% while patching from 6.7 to 6.8.
And no, there is no issues with my frigging Internet connection. Period.

Re-running patcher, scanned a few thousand files, and get this:

000020.118| ALWAYS| Queued Dradis event to be sent.

I just get this everytime i try to update
https://gyazo.com/ce9ec6cc5a2b6bbf61ee8f5f34503219

Hello!

Usually this is a sign that something is obstructing the patch, like a Connection Error or a firewall. Try reading through [this Connection KB](http://riot.com/12B7oac) for steps to troubleshoot both; while you should try every step, the Firewall section may be the most successful in helping your patch. :)

Let me know if you find this helpful or if the Patch is still having trouble after you're done. :)

Hey FluffytheTeddy!

How far in percentage does that patch make it before you see the unspecified error? Let me know, I'd love to help!

Im having the exact same issue, I just want to play league ffs...
I know its URF weekend isnt it? :(

Even though I use a windows PC, I've been having the low fps/distorted sound bug in the launcher for months, and it usually got fixed with a PC restart. This patch is different though; The client is just a black box until 2 minutes. After clicking launch and accepting the EULA, the second accept screen doesn't pop up. Instead, the screen seems to freeze/become unresponsive. Clicking the launch button again does nothing until 5 minutes later, when the button turns grey and the sound plays. Then it goes back to a freeze.

I've been trying stuff since yesterday; whitelisting LoL (whole Riot folder is whitelisted), deleting the lollauncher folder, re-installing, deleting Microsoft .NET 4.x.x, etc.... nothing fixes this. I have restarted my computer multiple times to no avail. Please help me with this.... URF is releasing tomorrow and I don't want to miss it!

This is an issue I don't believe we have seen for PC, but if you send in a ticket with these logs we can take a look into fixing you up. 

- Network Analysis: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq1

- NetworkInfo Log: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq4

- Process List: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq3

[Tech Specialist Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

well im not having in game problems since i cant even get in game. its been happening for a long time but anytime i try to log into league it takes 3 seconds trying to get a response from the server than it just says its a "login error" message i tried re installing it but it still had zero effect.

welp im at 4500 files...but im glad i read this and hope it ends soon

Edit: I got the 33% error message, i have fine connection, and I also have no antivrus. so I have no idea how i could fix number 3

edit 2: just release/renewed ip and flushed dns, no success

edit 3: i've reached 20 thousand files

edit 4: at 21 thousand files i received an unspecified error which said "check the logs" rito pls help

Edit 5: I've just updated java. I've gone through every option of your connection issues guide. its been 2 hours now.

edit 6: the year is 2320, I still await a response from our lourd and saviour rito. I pray to phreak in hopes that someone will contact me and resolve my issue so i can play soon. I fear i do not have enough provisions to survive another winter.

We can get our Technical team to take a look at your network logs and figure out just what is going on. Start by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be in touch to help you out!

Mine is stuck at applying patches at 50%...and it has been that way for an hour pls help!

> [{quoted}](name=Nìzmo,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JRZAxNXH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-20T12:27:01.441+0000)
>
> Mine is stuck at applying patches at 50%...and it has been that way for an hour pls help!

Hey Nizmo! 

If your patcher is getting stuck at 50% it's likely that there's a connection issue such as the network is dropping for short amounts of time, or there's packet loss. I suggest working through the [Connection Guide](http://riot.com/12B7oac). It's great for getting through the patcher and will optimize your network settings for League.

ahh now the pacthers stuck at 31 % and then after i wait long enough it says bug splat error
ok thank yo im going to run it on Friday at about 4 pm

**Please help.**
I haven't played League of Legends in a long time, ever since I rebooted my laptop. So I re-downloaded it with windows 8.1. But it didn't patch properly. So I uninstalled it. I reinstalled it today, with windows 10. However it is still not patching properly. I have tried many things to solve it. It was stuck at 33% always. Now it'll start at 0% ad go really slowly. But I don't think my laptop can last long enough to install and update it at that rate. I use a Compaq Presario CQ56-115DX Notebook with an AMD processor. It's pretty slow. But it did the job before, in Windows 7. I don't know what's wrong.

Well first of all, does your hardware meet the minimum specs? https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements If it doesn't, the game may not run very well- or not at all.

If it does though, let's work on [getting your permissions set up](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ) since you recently upgraded your OS. That will give League the green light from your OS to be installed properly. Give that a try, and let me know if you get stuck!

It still won't work, I don't know what's wrong though.
EDIT: I think I might know a problem involving this. Apparently the compatibility settings run it with Windows 7 settings. How do I change it to Windows 10? It doesn't have that option in Compatibility in Properties.

Ive been having the same issue and other boards are comming  to the conclusion it only happens with people using Century Link and WOW isp's.
At what point is it worth trying to reinstall? I am still scanning files (stuck at 33%) and nearing 25k.

When I open League from my short cut, it pops up the logo for half a second then it disappears and is replaced with a PVP.net Patcher Kernal has stopped working. I have forced a re-patch and have checked many of the solutions already out there but none of them work. Help?

Have you tried turning off your firewall? Firewalls and anti-virus programs can block programs if they're not sure what they are, or don't have the right permissions set up. That would be my first suggestion! Followed by the rest of the steps in the [Patching Guide.](http://riot.com/1Bm1U4c) If you still have trouble, let me know!

guys can anyone help me with this,,, i have everything working fine in the store except the runes buying page,,, can't get it to open ?

by the way, i just have to tell you what i tired to do to fix this problem but didn't work... i did allow the firewall to permit lol_luncher.exe and admin_lol_luncher.exe applications, restarted internet connection, flushed dns through command prompt and enabled ssl 3.0 and tls 1.0 in internet options.

At this point I'd suggest [sending in a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). The tech team will be happy to work with you and find a solution! We'll want to get you access to those rune pages again! :)

Hey there! How'd it go? Were you able to get patched up? If not then there may be a problem with your install. It looks like your files may have been corrupted. I'd suggest [doing a reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to ensure that you have clean new files! Give the patch a go after that and let me know if it gives you any trouble!

Hey Steven Gerrard, 

If you're still experiencing this problem it may be best you run through this [connection KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Your patching may be taking so long because the client can't connect to our Servers. If you're still having issues afterwords let me know.

Whenever I try to open LOL, the logo pops up for half a second then disappears. It is replaced with a PVP.net Patcher Kernal has stopped working error message. I have no idea what is happening and even tried to force a re-patch but nothing changed. Help?

Hey Joeber, 

The PVP error usually occurs when the client isn't able to connect to our servers, but this [Connection KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should clear that issue up. Some of the steps may seem trivial but make sure to go through them all. If you still have issues after going through the KB let me know.
The update for me is stuck at 1 percent Step 1/2: Updating Interference 283 MB (0 KBps). It's been like that for while now and idk what to do???

Hey DaboSS102! 

It may be that your client isn't accepting the patches. If you run through this [patching KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), if you're still having these issues, should fix you right up.

Unspecified Error occured check logs for more information.

I switched from EUW and NA a bit. This morning, everything was fine. When I got home today, I got the error and I can no longer play LoL.

Hey Kiriosity! 

Was your client trying to patch when the unspecified error occurred? Let me know so I can fix you up.
https://gyazo.com/83e69be4d9b05fa8efbd1788e579c20c everytime i try to join a game how do i fix it?

Hey there!

While I'm not certain on what the situation is, I have hunch it has something to do with either your game config or your resolution. Since I'm not sure, I feel confident that Tech would be a better supporter in this situation. You can reach out to them by [opening a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

I have a feeling that a lot of what they may ask you to do can be covered [in this KB here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting). If you have time, give it a look and run through some of the steps to see if any of them provide a solution. It is an FPS KB, but it may have solutions for your problem. :)

Hope this helps out! ^^

I tried patching from 6.7 to 6.8, the scanning files is just taking forever (13k+). I EVEN USED ETHERNET THIS TIME WHICH I NORMALY DONT HAVE TO! So i decided to redownload/install the whole game, and it took me a whole 1 and a half days just to get to 33% (passed through scanning files) and now, i have 3k mb with  only 50-100kbps....on ethernet.

Now my weekend is wasted, i only play during weekends and im totally depressed now.

Btw that means i have to spend a day or more just to get past this 33% ordeal cause the 1% ordeal has less than 1k mb of files and took more than a day

Im not gonna be able to play URF before  i fix this am i? T.T
